name: Employee Is Stressed - Prototype
description:
A metaphor for an employee's frustration with his boss, and their confrontation.

-----

Controls:
WASD - Movements
Right Click Hold - Aim
Left Click - Shoot

NOTE: If you find the controls difficult or "not intuitive", please be noted that it's designed that way, and the developer has no plan to make it "easier" or "more intuitive".

-----

Programming:
Lee Zhi Fei

Visual Design:
Sellwyn Loh

Music:
Wubbajack - by SleepingAwake

Font:
KenneyNL

-----

Still in development
